AboutSection.title: ABOUT NEXT.JS
AboutSection.summary: Next.js is a framework for React that offers hybrid rendering (SSR and SSG), automatic routing, API Routes, image optimization and CSS-in-JS support, being ideal for high-performance applications with improved SEO, such as blogs, e-commerce and dashboards.

UsesSection.title: BEST USES OF NEXT.JS
UsesSection.item-1: SEO-optimized web applications (SSR and SSG improve indexing)
UsesSection.item-2: Fast static sites (with static generation support - SSG)
UsesSection.item-3: Simple integration with Tailwind CSS, MUI and other libraries
UsesSection.item-5: Efficient dynamic pages (with ISR - Incremental Static Regeneration)
UsesSection.item-6: Better developer experience (Hot Reloading, Fast Refresh)
